/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene from a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of looking up towards the sky. The street is lined with lush green trees on both sides, their leaves forming a canopy overhead. On the left side of the street, a white bus is parked, adding a touch of urban life to the otherwise tranquil setting. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a beautiful contrast to the greenery below. In the distance, buildings can be seen, indicating the proximity of urban development. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene. The overall composition of the image suggests a harmonious blend of nature and urban life in Beijing.
